Text:
Thanks. I love Joe Hill's stuff. He's really outdone himself, branching into comics. 

Picked up his new book N0s4a2, and it was good. could see it as a dark TPB.  

Much appreciated!!

you're welcome BabiesDontNeedSpleens. check out
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8103559/Road_Rage_%282012%29_%28Digital_TPB%29_%28G85-Empire%29
if you haven't already.

Ty man. I listened to RR at work on audiobook, but prefer this type of format. would love to see them do some of 20th Century Ghost this way, too. Creepy story.

Thanks again.
Thanks a lot! Been waiting for this.
Thanks STFmaryville.  Seemed to take forever for this to come around, one of my favourite runs.
Thanks so much for this and for the many great comics you share, also babiesdontneedspleens if you have the N0s4a2 to share I would love to read that, it is not released here yet.
